suppress.notes:
file name: jackson-databind-2.15.2.jar
This is only triggered if you feed jackson circular input. See https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-databind/issues/3972.

file name: snakeyaml-1.33.jar
This only impacts deserialization, and we only serialize yaml. We would have to upgrade to SnakeYAML 2.0 to address this, and we use SnakeYAML via ring-middleware-format, which does not support v2.0.
See https://bitbucket.org/snakeyaml/snakeyaml/issues/561/cve-2022-1471-vulnerability-in for a discussion of the CVE.
This CVE only impacts programs using Clojure < 1.9.0, and gets reported for any jar that has a lower Clojure in its pom, even if the project being checked is using a newer Clojure (as we are).
